message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal, and I believe it's worth every penny. Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of your product, but I am only willing to pay up to $12,000 for it. Could we possibly come to an agreement at this price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  While I understand your position, I'm still hoping to get a bit closer to my asking price. I'm willing to go down to $13,000. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I am still unable to exceed $12,000 for the product. Would it be possible to meet at this price point?
